name: Dojini
description:
Dojini is a 2d platformer game where you control two characters at the same time.
After Dojini had his body and mind split into two different dinos after a wizard put a curse on him for eating his apple.
Dojini now finds himself trapped in a realm where his mind and body are split into two. When he moves his other body copies his exact movements.
You must find a way to escape the realm and defeat the wizard so that you can have your body returned.
Can you accomplish this task

Features :

Game will feature 30 fun levels

Steam Achivements

Great Boss Battle
